mapper.insert: insert into sport_place (id, type, identifier, start_time, end_time, deleted, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sport_place set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identifier = #{identifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, type, identifier, start_time, end_time, deleted, create_time, update_time from sport_place
